author: Paul Rankin
method: To make the crisps, heat the oil in a large pan or in a deep fat fryer. (CAUTION: Hot oil can be very dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Slice the sweet potato on a mandolin. They should be round, thin discs. Once the oil is heated, fry the sweet potatoes. Drain on kitchen paper. Season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Serve in a large bowl.
